detailsOfAchievement: Dakshin Budhakhhali Improvement Society ( DBIS) was started having its two folds objectives namely to improve the quality of life of poor people through sustainable community development activitiesand educate the people including women, youth and childrenat adolescent stage so that they can enjoy their rights.At the begining, the organisation carried out some sorts of educational activities for the villages, but with in a short period(2002-03), the organisation relized that thereshould be some structured programme intervention forachieving its objectives. And from then, the team started to organize the women and facilitate them to form SELF HELP GROUPs. Now, the organization works with 500 women leaded SHGs for poverty eradication programme through Micro-finance, training for the capacity building and awareness generation activities. the organisationbelieves in local resources mobilization and its optimumuses for community development. the organisation has been emerged as one of leading Micro-finance institutes under Micro Sate Branch of Indian Bank.DBIS is now works in three district of West Bengal. It has been manned by a team of dedicated and professional to fulfill the objectives. The organisation has completed its 06 years of its service to the poor, under privileged people in three district of West Bengal.The organisation has given more concentration on the livelihood and economic development & women empowerment for poor and integrated child welfare programme.The target of the organisationis to work with 25000 poor families by 2015 for their over all development. The organisation believes that without economic stability, the question of justice, dignity, sovereignty and equality is unrealistic to the poor in our society. on the other hand, until or unless the women are empowered, or are not taking part in the decision making process in the family, the children who are the backbone of our society will not get spaces for their age appropriate growth & development. Keeping all the factors in mind, the organisation started Micro-finance through women leaded SHGs as an instrument for poverty alleviation.

detailsOfAchievement: To access all people living with HIV/AIDs in Dakshin Dibnajpur bring them under one Umbrella , and help them live a more productive life with dignity and self confidence and improve the Survival and Quality of life of PLHIV, To function as a coalition of community based organization and Block level network of people living with HIV/AIDS in Dakshin Dinajpur. To acquire, establish, start, aid ,run, maintain or manage educational institutes ,libraries for the benefit of the public. To arrange and organic lectures, debates, discussions, seminars & excursions for diffusion of knowledge. To publish or cause to be published useful literatures, magazines, etc, without profit motive. To study, cultivate and demonstrate draft of music and dancing. To promote and encourage advancement of literary, cultural, political, religious & scientific education. To help the Needy student of all communities for the prosecution studies. To help the age ,sick ,helpless and indigent persons. To work for the happiness of the down trodden needy people for their primary needs such as food ,cloth ,education and shelter etc. To import and develop social awareness among the illiterate women and men by organizing awareness camps from time to time. To organic an ambulance for free rendering service to the needy patients. To establish and maintain basic and adult education centre to remove the illiteracy .To arrange and organize dead body carrier for free rendering service to help the needy people of the society .To open charitable dispensaries ,first aid centre ,blood donation camp from time to time and to generate awareness amongst people suffering from Thalasimia, Cancer disease etc. To arrange and organize education on computer both in theoretical and practical classes among the needy students of the society without profit motive .To render relief to the suffering in times of famine, flood, drought, earthquake and other natural calamities. To educate the people about pollution and arrange plantation of trees in the locality to make the world green. To arrange and organize old age home to help the needy people of the society without profit motive. To arrange for medical treatment to the Deaf & Dumb and handicapped persons by rendering qualified doctors, medicines and other allied articles free of cost. To help the people in marriage , funeral and cremation of the dead. To help the organize self-help group based program for augmentation of livelihood opportunities of the people at the grass root level as being beneficial to the public or to a section of public.

detailsOfAchievement: Discover A New Dawn (DAND) is a Kolkata based social welfare organization working for the purpose of development and rehabilitation of people with disabilities and undertakes various charitable activities for the benefit of the differently-able community as a whole. Maarg Darshan An initiative for those who tend to underestimate their capability to do something, owing to their physical disability. It works as an inspiration for those who consider themselves incompetent to achieve their desired goal. On many instances virtually loosing the zeal to strive and feel comfortable by taking refuge in the home on the ploy of being physically disabled. Now, this is exactly where our work starts. We provide you full Career Counselling and become a part of your journey till you reach your goal. We thoroughly support you in taking right career decision, depending upon your marks, interests and aptitude and subsequently conduct you for a better existence. Field Study / Survey DAND plans to venture into a field study to examine existing scopes for better employment opportunities for disabled and accordingly strategies on building up mechanisms accessible to beneficiaries seeking employment.

detailsOfAchievement: Brief history of the Institute: Palli Sree Ram Memorial Society is a Training & Educational Society for mainly needy students. We are working to import and development social awareness among the less educated youth by organizing awareness camps from time to time .Society founded in Feb 2013 with it has its headquarters located at Kolkata, West Bengal, India. The Society has been set up by some successful educationalists of India with a purpose to make it one of the most unique Training and Education Facilitator in India. The objective has been to provide youths with quality education and equipping them with unique skills to enable them to give themselves a head start in the job market mainly. At the same time, help industry to deliver internationally competitive performance by having access to locally available, internationally benchmarked, skilled manpower trained in line with their requirements. Palli Sree Memorial Society is the partner of Disha Academy .Where Disha Academy is an empanelled training organization by PBSSD. Disha Academy is taking care of vocational training part of Palli Sree Memorial Society. Achievements Of Palli Sree Ram Memorial Society Palli Sree Memorial Society is working as a partner of Disha Academy, Disha Academy is enlisted at Paschim Banga Society For Skill Development At Palli Sree Ram Memorial Society our approach to vocational training and women empowerment is path breaking. We do not provide students what they need, instead our approach has been to identify market requirement and structure our curriculum to transfer those skills to our students. For us Vocational training is incomplete without jobs. Hence every focus in our vocational training initiative is JOBS. At the name of Disha Academy(Palli Sree Memorial Society ) have given training in 18 Govt Schools and Colleges and trained almost 1200 Students and among them 854 students have already placed in different Companies. We have taken workshop for Visva Bharati Faculties for written and Verbal Communication We have a unique process wherein we have identified the KRAs of the work that a 1 year experienced resource would do on finding a good job. These KRAs(Key Result Area) have been designed in content form and students are trained to perform these activities in a LIVE WORKING ENVIRONMENT projects Student is also prepared for first hour productivity and interview readiness. This is a high demand career program. We are organizing different awareness camps for women empowerment, distribution of cloth and food to the distress women. Palli Sree Memorial Society is identifying society needs and try to work on that. Ongoing projects We are running two projects at the moment in the name of Disha Academy, First one is from West Bengal Scheduled caste and schedule tribe & Finance and Corporation, we are providing tailoring and master tailoring MES Course to 100 SC & ST youth. Second one is from Social Directorate of women and child welfare west bengal, we are training and preparing 42 women inmates in Bedside assistant MES course at Vidya Sagar Balika Bhavan, Paschim Medinipur.

sourceOfFunds.purpose: We have given training of 100 SCstudents and aftr that 83 students absorbed in different workshops. We have given training of 32 orphan girls funded by WB Women and Social Welfare and Development and all the students got placement.

sourceOfFunds.purpose: The Ngo Dishari runs a small tailoring school at Sutahata, a small village town near Haldia, under Purba Medinipur district, West Bengal. The organization trains the women of the financially weaker section, who basically dwell in the remote areas. The scope of earnings of the local women is almost nil as this area is a agricultural zone. Most of the women work as a maidservant to the near by city Haldia and is deprived of having a proper remuneration against their labor.

The Ngo Dishari runs a small tailoring school at Sutahata, which is a tiny village town near the city Haldia, under Purba Medinipur district, West Bengal. Dishari trains the poor women from agricultural family, as there is no scope for these rural women to earn money except working as a maid servant in the near by city Haldia. The paucity of good economic family background, the paucity of self development skill,most of them are deprived of having proper salary against their labour.

detailsOfAchievement: DOLLS THEATRE started in the year 1990 with the form of puppetry. The group engaged with the research work on puppetry to apply new Techniques in the contemporary puppet world, their presentations carry a new idea, a creation of medium to reach and relate to mankind and nature. Dolls Theatre has travelled widely in India and abroad, participating in governmental and non-governmental festivals & other cultural programmes . The group has earned munificent appreciation at the prestigious International Puppet Theatre Festival in Tehran, Israel, Spain respectively. During the course of their journey they have worked in mass medias like Doordarshan, Films. Furthermore, attended workshops and performed their plays at various parts of the world. The Theatre has earned active participation on platforms like Sangeet Natak Academy, EZCC, NZCC, ICCR, U.P. Sangeet Natak Academy, IGNCA, SPICMACAY among others.
